thread.section_title: River Palace Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: great location, nice hotel, good value for money
thread.title_full: great location, nice hotel, good value for money - Review of River Palace Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Eleni T
title: great location, nice hotel, good value for money
text: location is perfect. all main tourist sites walking distance with the piazza on your doorstep with restaurants, coffee shops, icecream parlours and shops immediately to hand. Hotel clean, breakfast lovely and happy hour definitely worth the money with a few snacks to keep you going at the end of a long day - would definitely return and recommend.
